0.0.3.en: Now checks the Community store as well

0.0.4.en:
Added Flow trigger for app update available.
The time to check for updates can now be set.
Athom store is only checked for apps installed from the store

0.0.5.en:
Added 'Store' tag to the flow trigger that can be either 'Community Store' or 'Athom Store'.
Add 'test ' to the 'New Version' tag value when the new version is a test version.

0.0.6.en:
Notifications and triggers are now only sent once per app version
Changed config page notification method for improved reliability and error reporting

0.0.7.en: Fix error in version number parser that found 10 to be less than 9

0.0.9.en: Fixed issue with apps that have illegal URI characters in their name (e.g. <-group->)

0.0.10.en: Fixed issue with apps that have illegal URI characters in their name (e.g. tado°)

1.0.0.en: Rebranded to suit it's current role

1.0.1.en: Fixed (again) issue with apps that have illegal URI characters in their name (e.g. tado°)

1.0.2.en: Fixed missing /test/ introduced in last version
